vocabInfos.lsjDefs: Paphos , a town in Cyprus celebrated for its temple of Aphrodite, [8th/7th c.BC]:—;adjective πάφιος, η, ον, of Aphrodite, [5th/4th c.BC] (Middle Liddel)
vocabInfos.mediumDef: § Paphos, the chief city in the island of Cyprus
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
帕弗 这个專有地名在原文的意思是 "沸騰 或 熾熱"
塞普魯斯西岸的城市,羅馬總督所在地(徒 13:6,13)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
帕弗 这个专有地名在原文的意思是 "沸腾 或 炽热"
塞普鲁斯西岸的城市,罗马总督所在地(徒 13:6,13)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ba-phô; Pa-phô nằm phía tây nam Cộng hòa Síp.
